name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Debut
description: 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Debut' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ Debut) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on May 24th, 2012. It is the sixth entry to be made for the main series, featuring brand new routes for all of the previous dateable characters, as well as the entrance of band members QUARTET NIGHT. There was a special edition released for the Nintendo Switch in 2021.
